text: At the Gates is a heavy metal band from Gothenburg, Sweden. They, along with In Flames, are seen as a big influence on the type of heavy metal called melodic death metal. ==References== Category:1990 establishments in Sweden Category:1996 disestablishments in Sweden category:Death metal bands category:Swedish heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups from Gothenburg Category:Musical groups established in 1990 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1996
title: At the Gates
